title: Google\Cloud\AIPlatform\V1\ModelDeploymentMonitoringScheduleConfig
name: ModelDeploymentMonitoringScheduleConfig
description:
The config for scheduling monitoring job.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.ModelDeploymentMonitoringScheduleConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.monitor_interval
params.description: Required. The model monitoring job scheduling interval. It will be rounded up to next full hour. This defines how often the monitoring jobs are triggered.

params.name: data.monitor_window
params.description: The time window of the prediction data being included in each prediction dataset. This window specifies how long the data should be collected from historical model results for each run. If not set, [ModelDeploymentMonitoringScheduleConfig.monitor_interval][google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.ModelDeploymentMonitoringScheduleConfig.monitor_interval] will be used. e.g. If currently the cutoff time is 2022-01-08 14:30:00 and the monitor_window is set to be 3600, then data from 2022-01-08 13:30:00 to 2022-01-08 14:30:00 will be retrieved and aggregated to calculate the monitoring statistics.

methods.description:

methods.name: getMonitorWindow
methods.description:
The time window of the prediction data being included in each prediction dataset. This window specifies how long the data should be collected from historical model results for each run. If not set, [ModelDeploymentMonitoringScheduleConfig.monitor_interval][google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.ModelDeploymentMonitoringScheduleConfig.monitor_interval] will be used.

e.g. If currently the cutoff time is 2022-01-08 14:30:00 and the monitor_window is set to be 3600, then data from 2022-01-08 13:30:00 to 2022-01-08 14:30:00 will be retrieved and aggregated to calculate the monitoring statistics.
